thread.title: Dallastown tennis coach Deb Gable honored by USTA
thread.title_full: Dallastown tennis coach Deb Gable honored by USTA

author: GameTimePA.com
title: Dallastown tennis coach Deb Gable honored by USTA
text:
Dallastown tennis coach Deb Gable honored by USTA GameTimePA.com Posted: 10/19/2015 09:17:59 PM EDT 
Dallastown tennis coach Deb Gable was named to The United States Tennis Association's 2015 No-Cut Coach All-Star Team. The No-Cut Coach All-Star Team recognizes 12 exceptional middle and high school coaches throughout the nation who implement a no-cut policy, which welcomes all interested students to be a part of their school's tennis team. 
Gable has been coaching at Dallastown since 2005 and holds a record of 161-39, according to a press release. 
"These coaches play a critical role not only in the development of student-athletes throughout the year, but the success of No-Cut Tennis and the sport of tennis as a whole," said Glenn Arrington, Director, USTA High School Tennis. "We are extremely proud of these coaches as they foster inclusion and continue to help shape and mold today's youth into well-rounded student athletes." Advertisement
